required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Minimally Invasive Surgery Versus Traditional Open Surgery In The Treatment Of Single Level Lumbar Stenosis
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-Label Randomized Controlled Study of the Efficacy of Surgical Treatment in Patients With Single Level Lumbar Spinal Stenosis Using Minimally Invasive Surgery and Traditional Open Surgical Procedure

lead_sponsor.agency: Novosibirsk Research Institute of Traumatology and Orthopaedics n.a. Ya.L. Tsivyan

clinical_study.source: Novosibirsk Research Institute of Traumatology and Orthopaedics n.a. Ya.L. Tsivyan

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine the effectiveness of minimally invasive surgical technique over the traditional open surgical procedure in patients with degenerative lumbar stenosis

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Oswestry Disability Index (ODI)
primary_outcome.description: To observe the change of ODI as compared to baseline through follow-up terms

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Oswestry Disability Index (ODI)
secondary_outcome.description: To observe the change of ODI as compared to baseline through follow-up terms

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Numeric Pain Rating Score (NPRS)
secondary_outcome.description: To observe the change of NPRS as compared to baseline through follow-up terms

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in EuroQol Five-Dimensional descriptive system questionnaire (EQ-5D)
secondary_outcome.description: To observe the change of EQ-5D as compared to baseline through follow-up terms

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Douleur Neuropathique 4 (DN4)
secondary_outcome.description: To observe the change of DN4 as compared to baseline through follow-up terms

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in The Health Transition Item from SF-36 (HTI Item)
secondary_outcome.description: To observe the change of HTI Item through follow-up terms

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Clinical Global Impression Of Change (CGIC) scale
secondary_outcome.description: To observe the change of CGIC through follow-up terms
Interbody fusion rate on CT based on Tan grades
Total cost of surgical procedure (implanted system, the salary for surgery team) and the cost of patient's staying at the clinic before discharge.
Document Adverse Events (incl. adverse events related to device) occurrence throughout the study

intervention.description: Patients will receive a single level instrumented fusion using a minimally invasive or open traditional surgical procedure with a posterior fixation. For the use of a posterior fixation system, the CD HorizonÂ® Spinal System, is mandatory in this study and will be either minimally invasive or open.

facility.name: Novosibirsk Research Institute of Traumatology and Orthopaedics n.a. Ya.L. Tsivyan
